sentences.en: 13 soldiers were killed and 10 wounded in action.
sentences.cn: 战斗中有13名士兵阵亡，10名士兵受伤。

sentences.en: A Navy medic was wounded by sniper fire.
sentences.cn: 一名海军卫生员被狙击手射伤了。

sentences.en: He howled like a wounded animal as blood spurted from the gash.
sentences.cn: 当血从伤口中喷出时，他像一只受伤的动物一样嚎叫起来。

sentences.en: He was deeply wounded by the treachery of close aides.
sentences.cn: 他被亲密助手的背叛深深地伤害了。

sentences.en: He was wounded in both legs and severely peppered with shrapnel.
sentences.cn: 他两条腿都挂彩了，人也被如雨的弹片炸成重伤。

sentences.en: He was wounded in the shoulder by a ricochet.
sentences.cn: 他被一颗跳弹打伤了肩膀。

sentences.en: Hospitals said they could not cope with the wounded.
sentences.cn: 医院表示无力收治这么多伤者。

sentences.en: I think she feels desperately wounded and unloved at the moment.
sentences.cn: 我想她此刻定会觉得受到了极大的伤害，无人关爱。

sentences.en: Seven people were wounded when soldiers fired rubber bullets to disperse crowds.
sentences.cn: 士兵发射橡皮子弹驱散人群时有7个人受了伤。

sentences.en: The driver of an evacuation bus was wounded by shrapnel.
sentences.cn: 一辆疏散大巴的司机被弹片炸伤。

sentences.en: The gun was fired and Beaton was wounded a second time.
The two wounded men were taken to a nearby hospital.
sentences.cn: 两名受伤男子被送到附近医院。

sentences.en: There was an exchange of fire during which the gunman was wounded.
sentences.cn: 有过交火，其间那名持枪歹徒受伤了。

sentences.en: They were told to carry their wounded and leave their dead.
sentences.cn: 他们被命令抬走伤员，丢下死者。

sentences.en: Thousands of people battled with police and several were reportedly wounded.
sentences.cn: 数千人与警方发生冲突，据报道有数人在冲突中受伤。
